title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for using dB dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39B7@

1 point is earned for the answer with reason

dB dt | B=40 = 1 5 ( 60 )=12 dB dt | B=70 = 1 5 ( 30 )=6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@56CA@

Because dB dt | B=40  > dB dt | B=70 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A16@ , the bird is gaining weight faster when it weighs 40 grams.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the d 2 B d t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca WGKbWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaamOqaaqaaiaadsgacaWG0bWa aWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaaaaaaa@3B74@ in terms of B

1 point is earned for the explanation

d 2 B d t 2 =− 1 5 dB dt =− 1 5 ⋅ 1 5 ( 100−B )=− 1 25 ( 100−B ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@58FD@

Therefore, the graph of B is concave down for 20≤B<100 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D19@ . A portion of the given graph is concave up.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the separation of variables

1 point is earned for the antiderivatives

1 point is earned for the constant of integration

1 point is earned for using initial condition

1 point is earned for solving for B

dB dt = 1 5 ( 100−B ) ∫ 1 100−B dB= ∫ 1 5 dt −ln| 100−B |= 1 5 t+c Because 20≤B<100, | 100−B |=100−B. −ln( 100−20 )= 1 5 ( 0 )+C⇒−ln( 80 )=C 100−B=80 e −t/5 B( t )=100−80 e −t/5 , t≥0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@B21D@
